sentences.en: A manufacturer can amplify the demand of a product by advertising widely.
sentences.cn: 厂商能用大做广告的方法来扩大人们对产品的需求.

sentences.en: A tube or a transistor can amplify an incoming signal.
sentences.cn: 电子管和晶体管能放大输入的信号.
带有扩音设备的电吉他

sentences.en: By turning this knob to the right you can amplify the sound from this radio.
sentences.cn: 把这个旋扭向右转你就可以增大收音机的音量.

sentences.en: Current practices do not use such high - quality energy to amplify total energy storage in agricultural production.
sentences.cn: 现行的措施不能应用这些优质能源来扩大农业生产中能的总贮存量.

sentences.en: He knew they were waiting for him to amplify his bold reply.
sentences.cn: 他知道她们正等着他进一步解释他的大胆回答.

sentences.en: Let me amplify my earlier remarks.
sentences.cn: 我来详细说说我早些时候讲过的话.

sentences.en: Please amplify your remarks by giving us some examples.
The mist had been replaced by a kind of haze that seemed to amplify the heat.
sentences.cn: 薄雾散了，取而代之的是一种似乎更添酷热的烟霭。

sentences.en: The new manager wants to amplify the company.
There is no need to amplify.
These stories only amplified her fears.
sentences.cn: 这些故事徒增了她的恐惧感。

sentences.en: This landscape seemed to trap and amplify sounds.
sentences.cn: 这种地貌好像可以笼住并放大声音。

sentences.en: To amplify this highly simplified explanation, look at Fig . 3 - 1 .
sentences.cn: 为了补充说明这个高度简单化的解释参看 3-1 图.

sentences.en: We are using this transistor to amplify a telephone signal.
sentences.cn: 我们正在使用这种晶体管来放大电话信号.

sentences.en: We must amplify our effort by working a lot harder.
sentences.cn: 我们必须更努力地工作来扩大成果.

sentences.en: We must ask you to amplify your statement.
sentences.cn: 我们得请你对你的说法作进一步的说明.
